title: Thanksgiving to the Lord
meta: 12-slide presentation featuring 10 NIV Bible verses on gratitude for leading prayer and worship. Covers entering God's presence, thanksgiving in all circumstances, lifestyle of gratitude, overcoming anxiety, salvation, worship with music, and God's eternal kingdom. Perfect for Thanksgiving services, prayer meetings, and corporate worship.
scripture: Psalm 100:4, 1 Thessalonians 5:18, Psalm 107:1, Colossians 3:17, Ephesians 5:20, Philippians 4:6, 2 Corinthians 9:15, Psalm 95:2, Hebrews 12:28, Psalm 136:1
speaker: Prayer Ministry
keyThemes: Thanksgiving as gateway to God's presence

title: Living the Higher Life
meta: 14-slide presentation on Colossians 3:1-10 teaching believers to embrace their spiritual identity in Christ and live from their heavenly position. Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson uses powerful illustrations (airplane, eagle/chicken) to demonstrate living above life's circumstances through faith in Christ, love for one another, and everlasting hope.
speaker: Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson
keyThemes: Living from spiritual position in Christ
Three marks of maturity: Faith, Love, Hope
Set your mind on things above

title: How to Live a Life of True Worship
meta: 22-slide presentation on Romans 12:1-18 teaching true worship as total consecration of body, soul, and spirit to God. Rev. Casimir Bilong provides six key principles for living a life of worship: beware of the world, submit to transformation, understand your role in the body, use your gifts faithfully, build genuine relationships, and reflect Christ to the world. Includes 9 prayer points and practical applications for daily Christian living.
speaker: Rev. Casimir Bilong
keyThemes: Six principles for life of worship
Understanding your role in the body

title: How to Meditate God's Way
meta: 20-slide presentation on Joshua 1:8 teaching biblical meditation as God's chosen method for transformation and success. Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson provides practical instruction using the MUSE framework (4 M's) and MEDITATE acronym for moving God's Word from head to heart through sustained meditation. Includes powerful illustrations on brain rewiring, the tree by rivers of water, and 12 prayer points.
speaker: Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson
keyThemes: MUSE framework: Muse, Mutter, Mouth, Memorize
Day and night meditation as lifestyle

title: November 2025 - 2 Days of Prayer and Fasting
meta: 31-slide prayer guide for November 5-6, 2025. Day 1: Praying for HIM-U and the Nations (leadership, church planting, apostolic mandate, resources). Day 2: Praying for Harvest Olney (justification, Holy Spirit power, Invest Beyond, financial breakthrough).
speaker: Prayer Ministry

title: Biblical Meditation - The Key to Success
meta: 17-slide presentation on Joshua 1:8 teaching meditation as the most critical spiritual discipline for fulfilling God's purpose. Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson provides practical instruction on moving God's Word from head to heart through sustained meditation. Includes memorable illustrations and 12 prayer points.
speaker: Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson
keyThemes: Meditation as most important spiritual discipline
Word moving from head to heart
Mind as thermostat - can be reset
Practical steps: Read, review, rehearse, repeat
Meditation fuels all other spiritual practices

title: You MUST Be Born Again! (Kuku-jumuku)
meta: 15-slide presentation on the absolute necessity of being born again. Pastor Zangai Peabody delivers an uncompromising message on spiritual rebirth through God's incorruptible Word. Includes 12 prayer points.
speaker: Pastor Zangai Peabody
keyThemes: Natural man cannot understand spiritual things
Led by the Spirit as sons of God

title: Making is Greater Than Blessing - An Exhortation on Biblical Giving
meta: 25-slide exhortation addressing God's purpose in giving: transforming us into Christ's image rather than merely blessing us financially. Challenges two extremes (giving to get blessed vs. not giving due to self-sufficiency) and calls believers to sacrificial generosity that reflects Christ's character.
speaker: Special Exhortation
keyThemes: God's goal: making us like Christ
Giving to become, not to get

title: The Secret of Victory Over Sin, Satan And Self
meta: 44-slide presentation on Romans 6:1-14 revealing the secret to victory - letting Christ's accomplished work manifest in our lives through our union with Him. Part 4 of 'Salvation Explained: From Guilt to Glory' series by Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson. Includes 10 prayer points and practical applications.
speaker: Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson
series: Salvation Explained: From Guilt to Glory (Part 4)
keyThemes: Dead to sin, alive to God
Four steps: KNOW, RECKON, LET NOT, PRESENT
Victory over sin, Satan, and self

title: A Steadfast Hope
meta: 40-slide presentation on Romans 5:1-5 and Hebrews 6:13-20 exploring the third treasure of salvation - steadfast hope anchored in Christ. Part 3 of 'Salvation Explained: From Guilt to Glory' series by Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson.
speaker: Bishop Dr. Darlingston Johnson
series: Salvation Explained: From Guilt to Glory (Part 3)
keyThemes: Steadfast hope as essential to life

title: HIMU Men's Conference 2025 - Prayer Points
meta: 11-slide presentation with 10 prayer points for the HIMU Men's Conference 2025. Standing Firm, Leading Boldly theme covering conference preparation, speakers, spiritual growth, finances, health, brotherhood, and revival.
scripture: 1 Corinthians 16:13, Psalm 107:1, James 4:8, Zechariah 4:6, Deuteronomy 8:18, 3 John 1:2, Proverbs 27:17, Psalm 85:6, Nehemiah 8:10
speaker: Conference Prayer Team

title: Do You Love Me More Than These?: A Call To Radical Discipleship
meta: 36-slide presentation on John 21:15-22 exploring radical discipleship, love for Christ, restoration after failure, and God's call to willing disciples. Includes 7 prayer points and practical applications for daily Christian living.
scripture: John 21:15-22, Psalm 110:3, Matthew 22:14, Luke 9:23-24, John 14:15, 1 Peter 5:2-4
speaker: Pastor Maima Moore

title: October 2025 - 3 Days of Prayer and Fasting
meta: HIMU and Nations - Unshakable Hope

title: Three Treasures of Justification
meta: 40-slide presentation on Romans 5:1-5 exploring the three treasures that come with justification: Peace with God, Access to Grace, and Hope that does not disappoint. Part 2 of 'Salvation Explained: From Guilt to Glory' series by Bishop Darlingston Johnson.
speaker: Bishop Darlingston Johnson
series: Salvation Explained: From Guilt to Glory (Part 2)

title: Gospel of Grace Summary - Peace Child
meta: 22-slide summary presentation focusing on the Six Pillars of Grace, practical applications, and prayer points. Concise version perfect for prayer meetings and small groups.
speaker: Summary Version

title: Additional Weekly Prayer Points
meta: 15-slide presentation focused on intercessory prayer for America, Harvest Intercontinental Ministries, and newly planted churches in Canada and Ethiopia.
speaker: Prayer Ministry

title: The Gospel of Grace - Peace with God
meta: 50-slide presentation on Romans 5:1-2 featuring the Peace Child story, our legal standing before God, and transformation through grace. Perfect for teaching or preaching this powerful message.
speaker: Based on sermon transcript
